Text: Probably the best dramatized Bible to date. BIG thanks to verifire!!
Indeed, the best one. Is there a chance to get even a better bitrate on this?

@Maj_sm_jz: I'm sorry, but I don't know of any better rips than this one out there. I searched and found this somewhere and reloaded it after tagging it with 'mp3-player metadata'.. 

..but it's quite OK at 64, isn't it..? ;)
